name.ja: アミュージー・アノイアンス

requirement.en: When a card is sent to your opponent's Graveyard during their Main Phase.

effect.en: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to [the number of cards in their hand] x 300. Then, if you activated this card when a card was sent from the Deck to your opponent's Graveyard, send 1 random card from your opponent's hand to the Graveyard.
